body:
Hello everyone,


I have a question... I am implementing some simulation methods within
Groundhog, and I am intending to use the -5 option in gendaymtx. However, I
see that it does not exist in genskyvec.


Does it make sense to include it? I might include it in my Ruby version,
but I am not sure it makes sense since it is not implemented in the
original genskyvec.


If it does make sense... how does that work? any hints?


Best,


Germán
___
